title: Bollywood Debutant Jodis That Never Worked Together In A Film Again
text:
facebook 
When actors make their debut in Hindi movies, they try doing so opposite actors who are newcomers too. This is mainly to ensure both the actors are comfortable with each other, and get an equal amount of limelight. In fact, it is said that if the jodi looks great, they might end up getting more movies to star together in. But in the Hindi film industry, algorithms change every moment. There are several on-screen couples who, despite having a hit debut to their credit, didn't work together. Here are some we can think of. 
Sonam Kapoor and Ranbir Kapoor 
They both made their debut with Sanjay Leela Bhansali's Saawariya. The movie released a decade ago and, yet, the two have not done a single film together again. There are rumours going around that Sonam will star opposite Ranbir in Sanjay Dutt's biopic, but nothing is confirmed yet. 
Bobby Deol and Twinkle Khanna 
Twinkle and Bobby's debut film, Barsaat , did extremely well at the box-office and the two star kids became the toast of Bollywood. But they never worked together post that. Did something go wrong? 
Arjun Kapoor and Parieenti Chopra 
The two made their debut opposite each other in 2012's Ishaqzaade . A romantic thriller about honour killing, the two did a fantastic job as newcomers. They did several other Hindi films individually, but none with each other. Don't you think this pair should soon sign a movie together, at least once more? 
Tiger Shroff and Kriti Sanon 
We think the two looked adorable together in the film, Heropant i. While Kriti is doing several love stories and Tiger doing every other action film, we think the two should reunite and star in a romantic-action film. What say? Photo Credit: BCCL
